properties.name: connection.url
properties.description: JDBC Connection URL.

properties.name: connection.username
properties.description: User name used for JDBC connection.

properties.name: connection.password
properties.description: JDBC connection password.

properties.name: connection.driver.class.name
properties.description: JDBC driver class name used to establish database connection.

properties.name: data.source.factory.class
properties.description: Data source factory class name.

properties.name: connection.jndi.name
properties.description: Data source JNDI name.

properties.name: connection.jndi.lookup.name
properties.description: Data source JNDI lookup name.

properties.name: jpa.persistence.unit
properties.description: JPA persistence unit name.

properties.name: view.grid.rows.per.page
properties.description: Default number of rows per page for the data grid.

properties.name: password.encoder.strength
properties.description: Password encoder strength.

properties.name: lookup.batch.size
properties.description: The batch size for lookup response.

properties.name: view.grid.paging.page-labels-count
properties.description: Number of displayable pages numbers.

properties.name: connection.host
properties.description: Host where database server runs.

properties.name: connection.db.name
properties.description: The mysql database name where application data is stored.

properties.name: hibernate.generate-ddl
properties.description: Determines should hibernate generate DDL or not.

properties.name: hibernate.show-sql
properties.description: Determines should hibernate show SQL or not.

properties.name: security.token.validity.seconds
properties.description: Persistent token validity duration.

properties.name: security.default.authentication.success.url
properties.description: Default URL for redirect on authentication success.

properties.name: security.supervisor.authentication.success.url
properties.description: Authentication success redirect URL for supervising users.

properties.name: security.administrator.authentication.success.url
properties.description: Authentication success redirect URL for supervising users.

properties.name: security.operator.authentication.success.url
properties.description: Authentication success redirect URL for operating users.

properties.name: security.viewer.authentication.success.url
properties.description: Authentication success redirect URL for viewing-only users.

properties.name: static.media.url.prefix
properties.description: URL-prefix for static media.

properties.name: spring.application.properties.site.address
properties.description: A default site address for application.
